original_title: Marius Borg Høiby: Son of Norway’s crown princess indicted on multiple counts including rape | CNN
article_summary: Norwegian prosecutors have indicted Marius Borg Høiby, the eldest son of Norway's crown princess, on multiple charges including rape and violence. If convicted, he could face up to 10 years in prison. The trial is expected to begin in mid-January and could last six weeks. Høiby denies all charges and plans to present his version of events in court.</s>
